text: {| |} Ticonderoga II was a passenger vessel owned by the Lake George Steamboat Company to operate on Lake George. It was refitted for passenger use from a decommissioned U.S. Navy vessel. Formerly USS LCI(L)-1085, she was an built for the Navy during World War II. Like most ships of her class, she was not named by the Navy and known only by her designation until her refit. ==References== *https://www.navsource.org/archives/10/15/151085.htm *https://www.lakegeorge.com/history/steamboat-co-1950-to-2017/ Category:1944 ships Category:Landing ships of the United States Navy
title: Ticonderoga II
